Template tags¶

bambu_bootstrap.templatetags.bootstrap.bootstrap_footer(context)¶

Renders the navbar template (see Miscellaneous templates) for more information

bambu_bootstrap.templatetags.bootstrap.bootstrap_navbar(context)¶

Renders the navbar template (see Navigation templates) for more information

bambu_bootstrap.templatetags.bootstrap.bootstrap_scripts()¶

Includes the jQuery and Bootstrap scripts from Bower

bambu_bootstrap.templatetags.bootstrap.bootstrap_styles()¶

Includes the Bootstrap styles from Bower

bambu_bootstrap.templatetags.bootstrap.bootstrap_title(context, separator=' | ')¶

Renders the value of the title_parts context variable (a tuple) into a string, separated by a delimiter

Parameters:separator – The delimiter to use (defaults to a beam character (|))
bambu_bootstrap.templatetags.bootstrap.breadcrumb_trail(context)¶

Renders a two-tuple of page URLs and titles (see the breadcrumb_trail context variable for more information)

bambu_bootstrap.templatetags.bootstrap.html_attrs(context)¶

Adds a no-js class to the <html> tag

todo: Make this much more flexible
